title: Police probe assault on JVPers in Jaffna
content: Investigations are being conducted into the incident where Janatha Vimukthi Peramuna (JVP) member and Democratic National Alliance (DNA) Parliamentarian Sunil Handunnetti and several others were assaulted this evening in Jaffna, a senior police official told Adaderana. The official said that around 15 persons are suspected to have carried out the assault. Two separate police teams…
